description:
Maxwell decides to create a newspaper called The Ham-Ham Times after Hamtaro learns that Laura and Kana are making a newspaper for the school. They eventually reach a frozen over lake and start out towards an island on the lake. Maxwell faints after saving the Ham-Hams from a drainage hole, but, upon waking, he sees his rescue as the featured story in the Ham-Ham times. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: とっとこ特ダネ! のっぽくん
